entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:24 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 02:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -23.3°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -25.7°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:51 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then southwest 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 01:51 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 01:51 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 17. Forecast issued 01:51 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
